creditline: Gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
description: wood base covered in animal hide, with softer hides at top front and top back; attached wooden stirrups with white beading- one stirrup has hanging beaded panel; strap extends around belly of horse with decorative red and purple braided fringe
medium: Animal hide, wood, beads, cotton cloth, felt, wool, metal
title: Saddle
